nodes.description: 卡车炸弹在摩加迪沙Safari Hotel附近爆炸，造成大量人员伤亡
nodes.support_text: Police said a truck bomb exploded outside the Safari Hotel at the K5 intersection, which is lined with government offices, restaurants and kiosks, flattening buildings and setting vehicles on fire.

nodes.description: 爆炸两小时后，摩加迪沙Medina区发生另一起爆炸
nodes.support_text: A separate blast struck the Medina district two hours later.

nodes.description: 参议员Abshir Abdi Ahmed通报死亡人数达231人，伤者超275人，部分尸体未确认身份
nodes.support_text: Abshir Abdi Ahmed said the toll comes from doctors at hospitals he has visited in Mogadishu. Many of the bodies in hospital mortuaries have not yet been identified, he said.

nodes.description: 红会确认4名索马里红新月志愿者死亡，并警告失踪人员可能增加
nodes.support_text: The Red Cross said four volunteers with the Somali Red Crescent Society are among the dead and warned 'this figure may rise as there are a number of volunteers still missing.'

nodes.description: 救援人员用火炬搜索Safari Hotel废墟下的幸存者
nodes.support_text: Overnight, rescue workers with torch lights searched for survivors trapped under the rubble of the largely destroyed Safari Hotel.

nodes.description: 索马里政府指责基地组织关联的al-Shabaab实施袭击
nodes.support_text: Somali government blamed the al-Qaida-linked al-Shabaab extremist group for the attack it called a 'national disaster.'

nodes.description: 总统宣布实施三天全国哀悼，并呼吁民众献血救治伤员
nodes.support_text: President Mohamed Abdullahi Mohamed declared three days of mourning and joined thousands of people who responded to a desperate plea by hospitals to donate blood for the wounded victims.

nodes.description: 索马里信息部长称此次爆炸是首都史上最严重袭击
nodes.support_text: It is the single deadliest attack ever in the Horn of Africa nation.

nodes.description: 美国谴责袭击，承诺加强反恐合作与无人机打击
nodes.support_text: The US condemned the attack, promising to strengthen counterterrorism cooperation and drone strikes.

nodes.description: 分析学者Dr. Ashraf指出袭击可能是伊斯兰武装应对近期失利的反击
nodes.support_text: Dr Afzal Ashraf... the attack was likely a response to recent losses suffered by Islamist groups.

nodes.description: al-Shabaab尚未对此次袭击发表声明
nodes.support_text: However, al-Shabaab, which often targets high-profile areas of the capital with bombings, had yet to claim the attack.

nodes.description: Abshir Abdi Ahmed访问了摩加迪沙的医院
nodes.support_text: Abshir Abdi Ahmed said the toll comes from doctors at hospitals he has visited in Mogadishu.

nodes.description: 索马里武装部队撤离受伤同事
nodes.support_text: 索马里武装部队撤离受伤同事

nodes.description: 阿卜杜拉博士向《独立报》告知袭击
nodes.support_text: 阿卜杜拉博士向《独立报》告知袭击

nodes.description: 伊斯兰极端组织遭受近期损失
nodes.support_text: 伊斯兰极端组织遭受近期损失

nodes.description: 警察局长 Mohamed Hussein 宣布伤者因伤口在医院死亡的情况
nodes.support_text: Police Captain Mohamed Hussein announced that伤者因伤口在医院死亡的情况
I am appealing all Somali people to come forward and donate

nodes.description: 愤怒的抗议者走上街头
